sentences.sContent: I guess farming is about the cleanest way to make a living.
sentences.sContent_eng: I guess farming is about the cleanest way to make a living.
sentences.sCn: 我觉得经营农场大约是最清洁的一种谋生方式了。

sentences.sContent: Yes, we need to make a living, but making a living doesn’t mean selling — it means living.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yes, we need to make a living, but making a living doesn’t mean selling — it means living.
sentences.sCn: 是的，我们确实需要生存，但生存并不意味着一定要买卖什么，它应该是一种生活。

sentences.sContent: He had been a smart boy, even talented in languages and mathematics, but his mother knew these were no way to make a living.
sentences.sContent_eng: He had been a smart boy, even talented in languages and mathematics, but his mother knew these were no way to make a living.
sentences.sCn: 他小时候很聪明，甚至在语言学和数学方面有些天分，可是他的母亲知道这些东西不能拿来谋生。
